publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-5976Lynsey Findlay, A Selfless Mum (lodged on 16 March 2010) Stuart McMillan*, Bob Doris*, Ian McKee*, Robin Harper*, Willie Coffey*
S3M-5976 Lynsey Findlay, A Selfless Mum (lodged on 16 March 2010) Maureen Watt*, Ken Macintosh*

S3M-5976 Angela Constance: Lynsey Findlay, A Selfless Mum—That the Parliament congratulates Lynsey Findlay from the Livingston constituency on her recent top accolade of Selfless Mum of the Year at the Tesco magazine Mum of the Year Awards; acknowledges the difficulties that Lynsey faced in losing her mother shortly before the birth of her first child who was diagnosed with autism shortly thereafter; notes with admiration Lynsey’s tireless efforts to improve the quality of life of her son and his fellow schoolchildren at the Pinewood School in Blackburn by fundraising and rallying support for a suitable playground, and commends Lynsey for her love, courage and dedication to her family and community. Supported by: Jim Hume, Bill Kidd, Stuart McMillan, Bob Doris, Ian McKee, Robin Harper, Willie Coffey, Maureen Watt, Ken Macintosh, Michael Matheson*
